# EntityIsShearedComponent Class

## Extends
- [*EntityComponent*](EntityComponent.md)

When added, this component signifies that this entity is currently sheared.

## Constants

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:is_sheared";`

Type: *string*
